title: The Masterpiece of the Month: St. George and the Dragon, Charles Deering Collection
description: During July 1939, the Masterpiece of the Month was “St. George and the Dragon” by fifteenth century Spanish painter, Bernardo Martorell. Dated between 1434 and 1435, this painting depicting a scene of a Christian knight defeating a dragon is considered to be one of Martorell’s greatest works.

input: The Masterpiece of the Month: St. George and the Dragon, Charles Deering Collection
